document.full_text: human rights watch said on wednesday that bahrain authorities were harassing and isolating hospital patients wounded in anti-government protests when security forces began a crackdown in the kingdom two weeks ago.
document.title: rights group: bahrain targets wounded protesters
lines_and_colors: human rights watch said on wednesday that bahrain authorities were harassing and isolating hospital patients wounded in anti-government protests when security forces began a crackdown in the kingdom two weeks ago.
